revision.text: {{Article history |action1=GAN |action1date=June 21, 2007 |action1result=listed |action1oldid=139375427 |action2=PR |action2date=00:32, 19 July 2007 |action2link=Wikipedia:Peer review/Battle of Uhud/archive1 |action2result=reviewed |action2oldid=145555997 |action3=GAR |action3date=September 18, 2007 |action3result=Kept |action3oldid=158461341 |topic=War |currentstatus=GA }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Islam|class=GA|importance=mid|peer-review=yes}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=GA|old-peer-review=yes|Muslim-task-force=yes}} {{WikiProject Muslim history|class=GA |importance=high|Early-Muslim-history-task-force=yes}} }} {{User:MiszaBot/config |archiveheader = {{talk archive navigation}} |maxarchivesize = 200K |counter = 1 |minthreadsleft = 2 |minthreadstoarchive = 1 |algo = old(180d) |archive = Talk:Battle of Uhud/Archive %(counter)d }} {{archives}} ==Important edit== I made [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Battle_of_Uhud&diff=629175532&oldid=628821123 this] edit removing the claim that Muhammad raided the caravans of the Quraysh to get back his seized property. Muhammad and the Origins of Islam By Francis E. Peters doesnt even make this claim. See [http://books.google.co.uk/books?id=0OrCo4VyvGkC&printsec=frontcover here]. So whoever added that is just lying and trying to give the [[Caravan raids]] a defensive flavor when there is no such.--[[User:Misconceptions2|Misconceptions2]] ([[User talk:Misconceptions2|talk]]) 13:55, 11 October 2014 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:3|one external link|3 external links}} on [[Battle of Uhud]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=746682161 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Corrected formatting/usage for http://www.witness-pioneer.org/vil/Books/SM_tsn/ch4s7.html *Added {{tlx|dead link}} tag to http://www.amrkhaled.net/articles/articlesprint1767.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20070926230128/http://www.islamonline.net/English/News/2002-10/10/article28.shtml to http://www.islamonline.net/English/News/2002-10/10/article28.shtml *Added {{tlx|dead link}} tag to http://www.islamanswers.net/moreAbout/Uhud.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20051126000220/http://www.shia.org:80/ohud.html to http://www.shia.org/ohud.html When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.â€”[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 21:57, 28 October 2016 (UTC)
